metadata.title: CVE-2024-2961 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The iconv() function in the GNU C Library versions 2.39 and older mayoverflow the output buffer passed to it by up to 4 bytes when convertingstrings to the ISO-2022-CN-EXT character set, which may be used to crash anapplication or overwrite a neighbouring variable.

criterions.comment: glibc package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
